search_results.title: Ana Isla
search_results.snippet: Ana Isla is Professor of Sociology and Women's Studies at Brock University (St. Catharines, Ontario). She teaches courses in social and feminist theories.

search_results.title: About Isla - Isla Morley
search_results.snippet: Isla Morley grew up in South Africa during apartheid, the child of a British father and fourth-generation South African mother.

search_results.title: Isla Kay: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Isla Kay is a graduate of The Banff Centre of the Arts' Wired Writing Studio and Toronto's Humber School for Writers. She has published short fiction.
